mapper.insert: insert into real (id, city_id, airpressure, feelst, humidity, info, rain, temperature, temperature_diff, direct, power, speed, publish_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cityId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{airpressure,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{feelst,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{humidity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{info,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rain,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{temperature,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{temperatureDiff,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{direct,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{power,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{speed,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{publishTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update real set city_id = #{cityId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, airpressure = #{airpressure,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, feelst = #{feelst,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, humidity = #{humidity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, info = #{info,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rain = #{rain,jdbcType=INTEGER}, temperature = #{temperature,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, temperature_diff = #{temperatureDiff,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, direct = #{direct,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, power = #{power,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, speed = #{speed,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, publish_time = #{publishTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, city_id, airpressure, feelst, humidity, info, rain, temperature, temperature_diff, direct, power, speed, publish_time from real where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
